thread.title: Barcelona star Neymar produces awesome trick shot in Brazil training to send 15,000 crowd crazy
thread.title_full: Barcelona star Neymar produces awesome trick shot in Brazil training to send 15,000 crowd crazy

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Barcelona star Neymar produces awesome trick shot in Brazil training to send 15,000 crowd crazy
text:
Sport Barcelona star Neymar produces awesome trick shot in Brazil training to send 15,000 crowd crazy Brazil have won their last seven 2018 World Cup qualifiers - and confidence is clearly growing in the camp Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now   Thank you for subscribing!   
Neymar sent 15,000 onlookers crazy in Sao Paulo on Monday after producing an awesome trick shot. 
The Barcelona star is currently on international duty with Brazil , and his country are enjoying a decent run in their 2018 World Cup qualifying campaign having won their last seven games. 
Tite has guided the South American side to the top of their qualifying group, and victory over second-placed Uruguay on Thursday means Brazil are now seven points clear. 
Brazil host Paraguay next on Tuesday evening. Neymar makes the impossible possible (Photo: MARCA TV) 
A huge crowd gathered for Brazil's open training session on Monday and just before the players left the pitch, Neymar gifted them with something very special. 
The 25-year-old managed to score a goal with the ball some way behind the goal line. The Brazilian brilliantly curled his effort into the back of the net and sent the crowd crazy. poll loading Is Neymar the biggest actor in football? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
